name: App_GetApplicationApiUsage
description: Get API usage by application for time frame specified. You can go as far back as 30 days ago, and can ask for up to a 48 hour window of time in a single request. You must be authenticated with at least the ReadUserData permission to access this endpoint.

applicationId.description: ID of the application to get usage statistics.

end.description: End time for query. Goes to now if not specified.

start.description: Start time for query. Goes to 24 hours ago if not specified.

$ul: **apiCalls**: Counts for on API calls made for the time range.
**throttledRequests**: Instances of blocked requests or requests that crossed the warn threshold during the time range.
